attributes.action: Britain to offer political asylum to all defecting Russian soldiers.
attributes.additional_details: We are being shown as the enemies by Russian state propaganda, we can offer an alternative, we can offer the parents of serving soldiers a humanitarian option.
attributes.background: Offer political Political asylum to all Russian soldiers who surrender or defect in Ukraine.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610939
